name: HomeControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on hallway light”
”Alexa, set bedrooms to 72 degrees”
”Alexa, turn on bedtime”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your smart home devices connected to your SmartHome Hub from Sky Cheetah.

Requires the Sky Cheetah SmartHome Hub to be installed and operational.
The credentials needed for Alexa skill linking were provided by the dealer on install of the SmartHome Hub.
Please contact your dealer if there are any problems linking.

Please note that access to locks, garage door controllers, cameras and security devices is disabled in scenes when the scene is activated from Alexa.
